title: jagadIsha pancashara
sahitya:
jagadIsha pancashara sUdana nigamAgama vEdya paripAlaya mAm


caraNam 1    yOgijAta hrdayAbha sadanAdbhuta nAgabhUSaNa paripAlaya mAm
 caraNam 2    pAda vinata bhavakhEda daLana caNa sAdhu sEvita paripAlaya mAm
 caraNam 3    pura jalada pavana purandarAdi su-pUjita caraNa paripAlaya mAm
 caraNam 4    girijA su-hrdaya kuvalaya shashAnka karuNAvAsa paripAlaya mAm
 caraNam 5    jalajanAbha pada naLina bhajanaradAkhila shubhada paripAlaya mAm
